Accuracy.header: How do you want to measure accuracy

Parity.header: Fairness measured in terms of disparity
Parity.body: Disparity metrics quantify variation of your model's behavior across selected features. There are two kinds of disparity metrics: more to come....

Intro.explanatoryStep: Setting up your fairness assessment is easy

Feature.header: Along which features would you like to evaluate your model's fairness?
Feature.body: Fairness is evaluated in terms of disparities in your model's behavior. We will split your data according to values of each selected feature, and evaluate how your model's accuracy and outputs differ across these splits.
